actions.add-another: Save a newly created item; clear data (e.g., on a form)
actions.add-event: Add an event to the database
actions.add-manager: Add a manager to the database
actions.add-participant: Add a person into a meeting/group
actions.add-person: Add a person to the database
actions.confirm: Confirm some action (e.g., updating a password)
actions.continue: Proceed to the next intermediate step
actions.duplicate: Duplicate some action (e.g., duplicating an event)
actions.next: Go to the next page or step
actions.previous: Go to the previous page or step

courses.info-meeting-dates: Inform the user they can select multiple dates for a class meeting
courses.is-archived: For indicating that a course is currently archived
courses.new-offering-short: Action for creating a new course offering, short version for buttons
courses.no-prerequisites: For indicating that a course has no prerequisites

diplomas.courses-this-diploma: List of courses for a given diploma

treeview.admin-node: the word designated to the top-level node in the hierarchy tree

actions.add-image: Use in parent component to open the image chooser card

messages.no-image: Display when no image is selected
messages.not-found: Display when an image is not found

transcripts.courses-this-diploma: List of courses for a given diploma
